Title: Mailbox Permissions Manager
Description: Allows administrators to remotely view and manage permissions for any folder in a mailbox, as well as manage delegates.
HomeWiki:
Mailbox Permissions Manager
Allows administrators to remotely view and manage permissions for any folder in a mailbox, as well as manage delegates.

If you've ever been asked to give someone access to an inbox with several hundred subfolders, or found yourself having to log in to a shared mailbox account just to give a new user access to the calendar this program can help.

Important - please read the documentation before using to make sure you have the pre-requisites.

Features
  • Easily see which users or groups have what permissions to any folder in a mailbox.
  • Add, remove or change permissions with one click.
  • Apply permissions to a folder and all subfolders below it.
  • View, add, update or remove delegates of a mailbox.
  • Tabbed, resizeable interface.
  • Works with on premises Exchange server or Office365.
